data.body: Add a coverage badge to README.md and set up coverage reporting on GitHub. Options include: (1) Generate a coverage summary in CI and render a shield.io badge in the README, (2) Use a coverage reporting service (Codecov, Coveralls), or (3) Generate a local coverage report and commit a badge SVG. Ensure bun run test:coverage output is parsed and surfaced. Current overall: 76.9% stmts, 63.8% branches, 80.1% funcs, 80.6% lines.
